datasets.name: quant_neuropath_merged_metadata.csv
datasets.description:
The dataset derives from the Seattle Alzheimer’s Disease Brain Cell Atlas (SEA-AD), which curated a prospective, longitudinally characterised donor cohort deliberately spanning the full continuum of Alzheimer’s pathology. The dataset primarily has labels consisting of donor-ids, biological + spatial markers and metadata fields including Braak stage, Thal phase, CERAD score, dementia diagnosis, APOE genotype, Cognitive Status, and Overall AD neuropathological change. 

Details on biological & spatial markers are attached here. Each QND data entry encodes What (biomarker) × Where (grey matter / cortical layers) × How (area %, count, density, size, co-expression, etc.). All the QND data in this dataset is a permutation over these three axes.

What (Biomarkers):
- AT8 (pTau) – hyper-phosphorylated tau → core neurofibrillary tangles of AD.
- pTDP-43 – phosphorylated TDP-43 → limbic co-pathology that speeds cognitive decline.
- 6E10 (Aβ 1-16) – amyloid-β plaque antibody → canonical early and late Aβ burden.
- aSyn (α-synuclein) – mis-folded α-syn aggregates → Lewy-body co-pathology.
- Iba1 – microglial marker → innate immune activation indexed by morphology.
- GFAP – astrocytic intermediate filaments → reactive gliosis in late-stage injury.
- NeuN – neuronal nuclear protein → census of surviving neurons / loss.
- Hematoxylin – universal nuclear counter-stain → baseline tissue cellularity and QC.

Where (anatomical bins):
- Grey matter – the entire middle-temporal cortical ribbon, used as a global reference.
- Layers 1–4 – individual laminar bins capturing the radial gradient of pathology (L1 = molecular, L2 = external granule, L3 = external pyramidal, L4 = internal granule).
- Layers 5-6 – deep output layers quantified together because the image pipeline cannot always separate them cleanly.


How (measurement affixes):
total … positive area – raw immunoreactive area (µm²).
percent … positive area – fraction of the analyzed bin that is positive (%).
number of … positive cells/objects – count of labeled cells or plaques.
… per area – density normalized to tissue sampled (count · mm⁻²).
average … positive cell/object area – mean size of each labeled entity (µm²).
co-expression / co-localised objects – spatial overlap between two markers (e.g. AT8 + pTDP-43).
process area / process length (Iba1 only) – microglial branching metrics, a proxy for activation.
area analysed – denominator tissue area (µm²) for QC and normalization.
ripa … / guhcl … – biochemical ELISA loads of soluble (RIPA) versus insoluble (guanidine) protein fractions (pg · mg⁻¹ tissue).

raw.name: Donor ID
raw.description: Unique identifier for each donor.

raw.name: Primary Study Name
raw.description: Name of the primary study the donor is associated with.

raw.name: Secondary Study Name
raw.description: Name of the secondary study the donor is associated with, if applicable.

raw.name: Age at Death
raw.description: Age of the donor at the time of death.

raw.name: Sex
raw.description: Sex of the donor (Male or Female).

raw.name: Race (choice=White)
raw.description: Indicates if the donor's race is White (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Race (choice=Black/ African American)
raw.description: Indicates if the donor's race is Black or African American (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Race (choice=Asian)
raw.description: Indicates if the donor's race is Asian (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Race (choice=American Indian/ Alaska Native)
raw.description: Indicates if the donor's race is American Indian or Alaska Native (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Race (choice=Native Hawaiian or Pacific Islander)
raw.description: Indicates if the donor's race is Native Hawaiian or Pacific Islander (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Race (choice=Unknown or unreported)
raw.description: Indicates if the donor's race is unknown or unreported (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Race (choice=Other)
raw.description: Indicates if the donor's race is other (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: specify other race
raw.description: Specification of other race if 'Other' is checked.

raw.name: Hispanic/Latino
raw.description: Indicates if the donor is Hispanic or Latino (Yes or No).

raw.name: Highest level of education
raw.description: Highest level of education attained by the donor.

raw.name: Years of education
raw.description: Number of years of education completed by the donor.

raw.name: APOE Genotype
raw.description: APOE genotype of the donor, a genetic risk factor for Alzheimer's disease.

raw.name: Cognitive Status
raw.description: Cognitive status of the donor, such as 'No dementia' or 'Dementia'.

raw.name: Age of onset cognitive symptoms
raw.description: Age at which cognitive symptoms first appeared, if applicable.

raw.name: Age of Dementia diagnosis
raw.description: Age at which dementia was diagnosed, if applicable.

raw.name: Known head injury
raw.description: Indicates if the donor had a known head injury (Yes, No, or Unknown).

raw.name: Have they had neuroimaging
raw.description: Indicates if the donor had neuroimaging (Yes, No, or Unknown).

raw.name: Consensus Clinical Dx (choice=Alzheimers disease)
raw.description: Indicates if the consensus clinical diagnosis includes Alzheimer's disease (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Consensus Clinical Dx (choice=Alzheimers Possible/ Probable)
raw.description: Indicates if the consensus clinical diagnosis includes possible or probable Alzheimer's disease (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Consensus Clinical Dx (choice=Ataxia)
raw.description: Indicates if the consensus clinical diagnosis includes Ataxia (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Consensus Clinical Dx (choice=Corticobasal Degeneration)
raw.description: Indicates if the consensus clinical diagnosis includes Corticobasal Degeneration (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Consensus Clinical Dx (choice=Control)
raw.description: Indicates if the donor is a control subject (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Consensus Clinical Dx (choice=Dementia with Lewy Bodies/ Lewy Body Disease)
raw.description: Indicates if the consensus clinical diagnosis includes Dementia with Lewy Bodies or Lewy Body Disease (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Consensus Clinical Dx (choice=Frontotemporal lobar degeneration)
raw.description: Indicates if the consensus clinical diagnosis includes Frontotemporal lobar degeneration (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Consensus Clinical Dx (choice=Huntingtons disease)
raw.description: Indicates if the consensus clinical diagnosis includes Huntington's disease (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Consensus Clinical Dx (choice=Motor Neuron disease)
raw.description: Indicates if the consensus clinical diagnosis includes Motor Neuron disease (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Consensus Clinical Dx (choice=Multiple System Atrophy)
raw.description: Indicates if the consensus clinical diagnosis includes Multiple System Atrophy (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Consensus Clinical Dx (choice=Parkinsons disease)
raw.description: Indicates if the consensus clinical diagnosis includes Parkinson's disease (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Consensus Clinical Dx (choice=Parkinsons Cognitive Impairment - no dementia)
raw.description: Indicates if the consensus clinical diagnosis includes Parkinson's Cognitive Impairment without dementia (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Consensus Clinical Dx (choice=Parkinsons Disease Dementia)
raw.description: Indicates if the consensus clinical diagnosis includes Parkinson's Disease Dementia (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Consensus Clinical Dx (choice=Prion)
raw.description: Indicates if the consensus clinical diagnosis includes Prion disease (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Consensus Clinical Dx (choice=Progressive Supranuclear Palsy)
raw.description: Indicates if the consensus clinical diagnosis includes Progressive Supranuclear Palsy (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Consensus Clinical Dx (choice=Taupathy)
raw.description: Indicates if the consensus clinical diagnosis includes Taupathy (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Consensus Clinical Dx (choice=Vascular Dementia)
raw.description: Indicates if the consensus clinical diagnosis includes Vascular Dementia (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Consensus Clinical Dx (choice=Unknown)
raw.description: Indicates if the consensus clinical diagnosis is unknown (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Consensus Clinical Dx (choice=Other)
raw.description: Indicates if the consensus clinical diagnosis is other (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: If other Consensus dx, describe
raw.description: Description of other consensus clinical diagnosis if 'Other' is checked.

raw.name: Last CASI Score
raw.description: Last Cognitive Abilities Screening Instrument (CASI) score of the donor.

raw.name: Interval from last CASI in months
raw.description: Time interval in months from the last CASI assessment to death.

raw.name: Last MMSE Score
raw.description: Last Mini-Mental State Examination (MMSE) score of the donor.

raw.name: Interval from last MMSE in months
raw.description: Time interval in months from the last MMSE assessment to death.

raw.name: Last MOCA Score
raw.description: Last Montreal Cognitive Assessment (MOCA) score of the donor.

raw.name: Interval from last MOCA in months
raw.description: Time interval in months from the last MOCA assessment to death.

raw.name: PMI
raw.description: Post-mortem interval, the time between death and tissue preservation.

raw.name: Rapid Frozen Tissue Type
raw.description: Type of rapid frozen tissue preservation method used.

raw.name: Ex Vivo Imaging
raw.description: Indicates if ex vivo imaging was performed (Yes or No).

raw.name: Fresh Brain Weight
raw.description: Weight of the fresh brain in grams.

raw.name: Brain pH
raw.description: pH level of the brain tissue.

raw.name: Overall AD neuropathological Change
raw.description: Overall assessment of Alzheimer's disease neuropathological change, categorized as Not AD, Low, Intermediate, or High.

raw.name: Thal
raw.description: Thal phase for amyloid plaque distribution.

raw.name: Braak
raw.description: Braak stage for neurofibrillary tangle distribution.

raw.name: CERAD score
raw.description: CERAD (Consortium to Establish a Registry for Alzheimer's Disease) score for neuritic plaque density.

raw.name: Overall CAA Score
raw.description: Overall score for cerebral amyloid angiopathy.

raw.name: Highest Lewy Body Disease
raw.description: Highest level of Lewy body disease pathology.

raw.name: Total Microinfarcts (not observed grossly)
raw.description: Total number of microinfarcts not observed grossly.

raw.name: Total microinfarcts in screening sections
raw.description: Total number of microinfarcts observed in screening sections.

raw.name: Atherosclerosis
raw.description: Severity of atherosclerosis.

raw.name: Arteriolosclerosis
raw.description: Severity of arteriolosclerosis.

raw.name: LATE
raw.description: Stage of Limbic-predominant Age-related TDP-43 Encephalopathy (LATE).

raw.name: RIN
raw.description: RNA Integrity Number, a measure of RNA quality.

raw.name: Severely Affected Donor
raw.description: Indicates if the donor is severely affected (Y or N).

queries.question: Is there a Braak stabge-based difference in AD neuropathological burden among the donors?
